[0112] fix broken link

events.body: Is there any value in linking to a BIP 9 draft, when there is already a link to the actual BIP 9?

I'm not interested in proposing a change to this document,
but I will applaud it.

On Mon, Jan 24, 2022 at 1:34 PM MarcoFalke ***@***.***> wrote:

> link to the actual BIP 9?

For historical posterity? Doesn't seem very important, but we should address broken links. Perhaps that link should simply be removed.

> [luke-jr](https://github.com/luke-jr) added the [Proposed BIP modification](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/labels/Proposed%20BIP%20modification) label [5 hours ago](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1276#event-6557260940)

I was trying to avoid being labeled Proposed BIP modification...

Approve.

Sent from my mobile device;
please excuse typos and brevity.
